28000.name: Ashen Expanse - Blackened Causeway
28000.description:
Faint lightning flickers in the clouds over burnt flagstones. thin steam vents
hiss. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of distant
flame.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

west.description: The skull-paved road back to the Ashlands lies west.

28001.name: Cinderwind Flats
28001.description:
Faint lightning flickers in the clouds over burnt flagstones. a dry heat
presses on your lungs. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the
crackle of distant flame.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28002.name: Glass Dune Rise
28002.description:
Ash drifts in slow spirals over burnt flagstones. orange glows pulse from
cracks. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of distant
flame.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28003.name: Charred Marker Stones
28003.description:
Black grit crunches underfoot over burnt flagstones. ash-coated bones litter
the ground. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28005.name: Smoldering Wash
28005.description:
A bitter sulfur tang hangs in the air over charred stone pylons. distant
thunder rolls without rain. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the
crackle of distant flame.

south.description: A trail of cinders leads south through the haze.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28028.description:
The wind carries a low, furnace-like roar over charred stone pylons. distant
thunder rolls without rain. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the
crackle of distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

south.description: Ashen arches rise toward a gate of embers.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28029.name: Searing Switchback
28029.description:
Ash drifts in slow spirals over fractured obsidian. distant thunder rolls
without rain. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

south.description: Heat ripples toward the pyre to the south.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

28030.name: The Cinder Maze
28030.description:
Cinders skitter across the ground over fractured obsidian. a dry heat presses
on your lungs. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28031.name: Crown of Ash
28031.description:
Heat haze warps the horizon over charred stone pylons. a dry heat presses on
your lungs. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28032.name: Embercourt Approach
28032.description:
Cinders skitter across the ground over charred stone pylons. embers glow like
fallen stars. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28033.name: Ashen Gatehouse
28033.description:
Fine soot clings to everything over jagged basalt. distant thunder rolls
without rain. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of
distant flame.

north.description: The ashen expanse stretches north beneath the red sky.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: Heat shimmer dances over a scorched path to the east.

28034.name: Throne of the Ember Sovereign
28034.description:
Ash drifts in slow spirals over glass-smooth dunes. a dry heat presses on your
lungs. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle of distant
flame.

north.description: The cinder maze twists back north.

west.description: The blackened ground slopes west toward darker stone.

east.description: A gate of burning sigils stands to the east.

28035.name: The Sovereign's Pyre
28035.description:
The wind carries a low, furnace-like roar over jagged basalt. a trail of fused
skulls marks the way. The silence here feels heavy, broken only by the crackle
of distant flame.

north.description: A scorched stair ascends toward the approach.

west.description: Ashen arches lead back to the gatehouse.

28001.name: ash wraith
28001.long_desc: An ash wraith coils through the air, its form barely solid.
28001.description: A humanoid silhouette made of drifting ash and cold ember-glow. Its touch leaves frostbite and soot in equal measure.

28002.name: cinder marauder
28002.long_desc: A cinder marauder stalks the flats, ember-blade in hand.
28002.description: Wrapped in scorched mail, this raider wields a blade that smokes with every swing.

28003.name: obsidian golem
28003.long_desc: An obsidian golem grinds forward, shards shedding from its fists.
28003.description: A hulking mass of black glass bound with molten seams. Each step leaves a glassy footprint that cools instantly.

28004.name: ashbound huntress
28004.long_desc: An ashbound huntress watches you, bow drawn.
28004.description: Her eyes glow like banked coals, and her arrows trail sparks as they fly.

28005.name: slag hound
28005.long_desc: A slag hound prowls here, teeth like hot iron.
28005.description: A low-slung beast with a coat of molten slag, it leaves glowing pawprints in the ash.

28006.name: ember-touched warlock
28006.long_desc: An ember-touched warlock mutters over a circle of cinders.
28006.description: Charred robes hang in strips from this caster's frame. His fingers end in ember-black talons.

28007.name: glasswing harrier
28007.long_desc: A glasswing harrier circles overhead, wings slicing the air.
28007.description: A predatory wyvern with translucent wings of razor glass. Its shriek grates like breaking bottles.

28008.name: furnace sentinel
28008.long_desc: A furnace sentinel stands guard, core blazing.
28008.description: A knight of black iron, hollow-chested, with a roaring furnace where a heart should be.

28009.name: magma reaver
28009.long_desc: A magma reaver stalks here, molten blade dripping fire.
28009.description: This towering brute bleeds lava from cracks in its armor, leaving smoking trails in its wake.

28010.name: cinder warden
28010.long_desc: Cinder Warden Kael bars the way, spear wreathed in smoke.
28010.description: The Warden's armor is forged from slag and bone, and his spear burns with a low, crimson flame.

28011.name: scoria matron
28011.long_desc: The Scoria Matron rises from the ash, towering and hateful.
28011.description: A massive elemental of fused cinder and basalt. Her voice is a grinding avalanche of stone.

28020.name: ember sovereign
28020.long_desc: The Ember Sovereign stands amid the pyre, crowned in living flame.
28020.description: A monarch of living ember and obsidian plate, its eyes are twin furnaces. Each motion sends sparks spiraling through the air.

28050.name: Cinderbrand Greatsword
28050.room_desc: A massive greatsword of black steel smolders here.

28051.name: Emberguard Bulwark
28051.room_desc: A shield of scorched iron rests here, still warm to the touch.

28052.name: Pyreweave Robe
28052.room_desc: A robe woven of ember-silk lies in a neat fold.

28053.name: Ashen Stalker Dagger
28053.room_desc: A thin dagger of dark glass lies here, edges razor-sharp.

28054.name: Smoldering Longbow
28054.room_desc: A longbow of charred yew smolders faintly here.

28055.name: Cinderwind Lyre
28055.room_desc: A lyre strung with ember-sinew glows softly here.

28056.name: Ashglass Ring
28056.room_desc: A ring of translucent ashglass lies here.

28057.name: Cinderward Cloak
28057.room_desc: A heavy cloak of soot-dark fabric lies here.

28058.name: Crown of the Ember Sovereign
28058.short_desc: the Crown of the Ember Sovereign
28058.room_desc: A crown of living embers flickers here.

28059.name: Heartstone of the Expanse
28059.room_desc: A pulsing stone veined with ember-light lies here.
